name: carbonMonoxideLevel_getValue
description: This function is used to retrieve the carbon monoxide concentration in the house from a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the carbon monoxide concentration is being retrieved.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the carbon monoxide concentration is being retrieved.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to retrieve the carbon monoxide concentration.
